author: RTÉ News
title: At a glance: Latest global developments due to Covid-19
description: The coronavirus has infected more than 424,000 people and killed at least 18,000 across the world. More than 108,000 people have recovered so far, mostly in China, where life is slowly returning to normal. However, many other countries continue to escalate th…
content:
The coronavirus pandemic has infected more than 424,000 people and killed at least 18,000 across the world.
More than 108,000 people have recovered so far, mostly in China.
After a months-long lockdown, China's Hubei province, home to more than 50m people, … [+5823 chars]
